messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: So folks, our goal is to construct  a bluespace artillery. If you are interested in helping out at all with this station goal meet in front of the bridge at 16:00

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: It is now 16:00 does anyone plan on helping to construct artillery?

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: HoPline is open

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: We have 2 capitans in teh crew manifest somone stole the spare ID

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Due to an error with a rogue assistant, the manifest may say there are two captains. Ignore this, there is only one.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our omnipotence, we believe that one of the station's lesser lifeforms has developed lizard level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: Head of Personnel to conference room

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Courtroom.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Massive bluespace translocation detected.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Cargo Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheri:%ï¿½ MCayj^j<.3-BZZZZZZT

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The armory has been broken into, we likely have syndicate on board, if you see anyone acting suspicious (or possessing armory equipment) please report them to an authority

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: EVA Storage.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: New policy: anyone is allowed to make a citizens arrest on ANYONE smashing lights

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Well we tried to build the BSA but I blame the lights being out

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Warehouse.
